text: The Hisar Police Lines Golf Course, is in Hisar, in the Hisar district of Haryana State, India. ==Description== The course is located on Hisar-Barwala road next to Hisar Airport, parallel to the future runway extension. It is close to Blue Bird Lake, Deer Park, Hisar, and Shatavar Vatika Herbal Park, Hisar. It was set up by the Haryana Police, which is a department of Government of Haryana. ==References== Category:Hisar (city) Category:Golf clubs and courses in India Category:Sport in Haryana
title: Hisar Police Lines Golf Course
